## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-12.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnaces at Positions (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at Positions (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-12.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5), (-8.5, -45.5)
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-11.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

### Coal and Iron Ore Storage Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at Positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (53.5, -79.5), (55.5, -79.5), (60.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (41.5, -78.5), (41.5, -76.5), (43.5, -80.5)

### Iron Smelting and Transfer Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at Position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters due to collision or spacing
- Ensure there is no collision with existing entities when placing inserters. Check for nearby entities like chests or other inserters that might block the placement.
- Adjust spacing or change the direction of the inserter if placement fails due to existing entities.

### Errors when connecting belts directly to chests
- Use inserters to input items into chests instead of attempting to connect belts directly to them.

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check the inventory of the source entity before placing the inserter.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining or production processes from halting.
